title: Front Bevel Box Cover - Installation

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Do not install the O-ring by applying sliding pressure.
The O-ring must only be installed by finger pressing it into the groove as described below.
Press the new O-ring at diametrically opposite locations in the sequence shown in the illustration below.
Keep pressing the O-ring in until all parts of the O-ring is installed.
Fit the front bevel box cover and its protector, as noted for removal, and tighten the new fixings in the following two stages:
Tighten the fixings one to four in the sequence shown to
Retighten fixings one and two to

body.name: Front Bevel box cover and protector tighen TP0419_1
